title.narrative: Urban Governance and Development Program: Emerging Towns Project

description.narrative: The revised PDO is "to improve the capacity of the participating municipalities to plan, implement and fund urban development activities".

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :FA - Article IV 4.01 | Description :Adopt final Project Operations Manual (POM), satisfactory to the World Bank.| Due Date :01-Oct-2011

Finance Agreement :FA - Article V 5.01 (b) and Minutes of Negotiation - Para 8 | Description :Sign financing agreement forco-financing (through parallel financing agreement) the Institutional Development Component. | Due Date :31-Dec-2011

Finance Agreement :FA - Schedule 2, Section E 4 (a) (b) and Section F 2 (ii) (D) (E) | Description :Establish Project ManagementTeam (PMT) and Project Support Team (PST) in each municipality. | Due Date :01-Oct-2011
Finance Agreement :FA - Schedule 2, Section F 2 | Description :Sign Sub-project Financing Agreement, satisfactory to the WorldBank, with participating municipalities. | Due Date :30-Jul-2012
Finance Agreement :FA - Schedule 2, Section I.I.1 | Description :Prepare detailed consolidated annual work program and budget forsubsequent FYs. | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :FA - Schedule 2, Section IV B 1 (b) and Minutes of Negotiation - Para 10 | Description :Sign SubsidiaryAgreement, satisfactory to the World Bank, with TDF. | Due Date :31-Dec-2011
Finance Agreement :FA - Section IV B 1 (b) | Description :Approve relevant items of the TDF Business Restructuring Action Plan. |Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Fa - Schedule 2, Section E 4 (e) | Description :Sign Memorandum of Understanding (MoU), satisfactory to theWorld Bank, with participating municipalities. | Due Date :31-Dec-2011
Finance Agreement :Minutes of Negotiation - Para 13 | Description :Prepare detailed consolidated annual work program and budget forFY2011/12. | Due Date :30-Jun-2011
